overview: DJ PYGMALION has a strong feminist visual throughout – forcing the viewer to rethink gender norms, female sexuality and empowerment. Combing porn addiction with a subversive angle on the ‘male gaze’, DJ PYGMALION is an erotic poetic short shot down the rabbit hole of desperate masturbation. Watching porn is a multi-sensory experience… unless you’ve watched too much. There is always better porn, but hanging on the edge for too long has its downfalls.
title: DJ Pygmalion
